html:
2.21.21  11:42 am   Out of curiosity, have you already decided which song/video you're going to make after you finish the one you're currently working on,

      or are you going to wait on that decision until you finish uploading the current thing you're working on?
2.21.21  10:21 am   what do you think about indie music?

2.21.21  9:01 am   I really like your style of music. like not gonna lie I do really addict to your songs. From the music you made, did you use some kind of music's theory on that? or it's out from your plain feeling?
2.21.21  6:46 am   Are you mentally stable?
2.21.21  4:46 am   did you ever think once of making a movie?
2.21.21  3:35 am   how do you overcome writer's block?

2.21.21  1:35 am   is there any significance to the 8-ish seconds of white silence near the beginning of hotewig ?

      if so, what is it ?
2.20.21  11:38 pm   hello. do you create music for enjoyment?
2.20.21  10:48 pm   how do I be a genius
2.20.21  9:56 pm   do you use people's questions as a randomness generator or is your randomness generator better?
2.20.21  9:27 pm   Are you a human?

2.20.21  8:24 pm   Do all of your songs have meaning to them?

      Even your silly ones that SEEM to not make sense?
2.20.21  7:19 pm   do you prefer the making the music parts of your videos or animating them?
2.20.21  6:46 pm   There are more periods than i am used to seeing you type in the music video for "here comes the sun". What about the song made you feel the need to type more periods?
2.20.21  5:40 pm   any advice for beginner musicians?
2.20.21  5:36 pm   Is is ok to be weird?
2.20.21  5:10 pm   In " at the airport terminal ". Do you lick the terminal floor?

2.20.21  4:51 pm   I struggle between choosing to spend my time coming up with new ideas or finish existing ones that I started. I want to have a goal of 1 new musical idea per *reasonable amount of time*, but I don't know how to prioritize between investing time into new things when I have ideas outstanding that need attention. Do you have any suggestions/have you experienced this? thanks
2.20.21  4:41 pm   is cheese real
2.20.21  4:31 pm   how do you become more confident with something that you made?
2.20.21  3:46 pm   How big is the earth?

2.20.21  3:40 pm   in a previous question someone theorised that the meaning of "here comes the sun" is "having hope when everything seems horrible, because it'll get better eventually, giving you joy and love" and you said "pretty much".
what i'm wondering is if the message of "here comes the sun" (what was stated above) is something personal to you?

     perhaps from the time you wrote the song or when you chose to make it into a full music video or if it's just a more general message? (of course if it is something really personal you don't have to say)
2.20.21  2:48 pm   do you hate your fans
2.20.21  1:07 pm   is the thing that takes the most time in making a music video songwriting, pulling off playing the song, animating, editing, or procrastination?
2.20.21  12:11 pm   what's your opinion on comic sans

2.20.21  11:47 am   once you've done releasing all of your already written and performed songs in both video and audio form, will you consider remaking some of your old songs (like "the song song", for example, as it is your first 3-minute song you've written)?
2.20.21  10:08 am   Do you like popcorn?
2.20.21  9:53 am   What to do when you can't find what chords should go with the melody?

2.20.21  8:37 am   How did you learn music theory

     or how do you find such beautiful chords? - peter

2.20.21  7:54 am   was animating "here comes the sun" hard at all?

     if so, how long did it take you to get it the way you liked it
2.20.21  6:29 am   how long is a moment?
2.20.21  5:21 am   Is time about your perception?

2.20.21  4:51 am   do you ever start answers to these ueqstions with a Capital Letter, or use any caPitals anywhere in them, or have you ever used them,

yes

     and why
2.20.21  3:28 am   what is your video-making process
2.20.21  2:26 am   Have you ever written a melody or chord progression or whatever and over time it just becomes so familiar to you that it starts to feel like you didn't even write it?
2.20.21  1:03 am   did you have any inspirations for your videos or music

2.20.21  12:51 am   how do i come up with/find the cool chords you keep using in your videos?
for example the sad piano chords in here comes the sun.
2.19.21  11:51 pm   when did you record here comes the sun?
2.19.21  10:31 pm   Thoughts on pigeons?
2.19.21  9:19 pm   what is your favorite part of being a human instead of being a different thing
2.19.21  8:13 pm   are you going to make something
2.19.21  7:21 pm   how to be stupid
2.19.21  6:39 pm   I think you have the most accurate take on reality I've seen so far. How do you do it? I always get tripped up.
2.19.21  4:55 pm   have you ever made a song that was mediocre? not bad and not good?
2.19.21  3:49 pm   did "here comes the sun" use to have a slower BPM?
2.19.21  2:21 pm   while you were at the airport terminal, did you see birds made of trees buying tickets for the business class section?
2.19.21  12:59 pm   Bill, i'm really scared rn. How do you deal with fear?
2.19.21  11:24 am   what do you think about the letter E?
2.19.21  10:41 am   is it a problem if i cant stop listening to your music
2.19.21  10:15 am   Do you know anyone who makes similar music likes yours
